alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Jones; Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 17 at 12:17AM CST until February 17 at 1:00AM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Haskell County in west central Texas... Northeastern Jones County in west central Texas... Northern Shackelford County in west central Texas... Throckmorton County in west central Texas... * Until 100 AM CST. * At 1216 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located from Stamford to Avoca, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Throckmorton and Woodson around 1245 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Big Country Baptist Assembly, Us-183 Near The Throckmorton- Baylor County Line, The Intersection Of Us-183 And Us- 283, The Intersection Of Us- 283 And Ranch Road 209 and The Intersection Of Us- 380 And Highway 222. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
